page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: The block concerned covers the village of BRAISHFIELD,a small village of approx.600 residents,bounded by farms, woods and an Arboretum.The parish of Braishfield,part of Ampfield and part of Hursley are involved. The area undulates gently,the highest point being 79m above sea level. Page headings are as follows- 1.Introduction 11.Clubs 2.Housing 12.Old houses 3.Shopping 13.Historical site 4.Churches 14.Village assoc. 5.Village hall 15.Light industry 6.Schools 16.Farms 7.Higher education 17.Social concerns 8.Arboretum 18.Pubs and clubs 9.Nurseries 19.Personalities 10.Footpaths 20.Summary/credits
